title: The disgraceful Aníbal Fernández was reelected as president of the CAH
snippet: Previously, Fernández had been in charge of the confederation in a first stage between 2013 and 2016, when he was still president of Quilmes, National Senator, and General Secretary of the convicted Cristina Fernández de Kirchner.

title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: Fernández comenzó su carrera como asesor de la Comisión de Presupuesto de la Cámara de Senadores de la provincia de Buenos Aires en 1983. Entre 1985 y 1987 fue secretario administrativo del Movimiento Peronista de dicha Cámara y luego accedió ...

title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: After the 2009 mid-term elections, Aníbal Fernández was chosen to become the President's Cabinet Chief. He held this important position from July 8, 2009, until December 10, 2011.

title: Aníbal Fernández - Age, Family, Bio | Famous Birthdays
snippet: In 1991, he was elected Mayor of Quilmes and then as a member of the Constitutional Convention of Buenos Aires in 1994. He was appointed to General Secretaty of the Presidency in 2002 which began his close ties with different Argentinean presidents.
